name: API Workbench
author: MuleSoft
description: API Workbench, a rich, full-featured integrated development environment (IDE) for designing, building, testing, documenting and sharing RESTful HTTP APIs. It supports both RAML 0.8 and the recently launched RAML 1.0. RAML makes it easy to manage the whole API lifecycle.

name: raml2html
author: kevinrenskers
description: raml2html is a documentation tool that outputs a single HTML page console based on a RAML definition. It's written in NodeJS and it can be executed as a command line.

name: RAML-to-Swagger2-converter
author: eshwanth
description: The goal of RAML-to-Swagger-converter is to provide a tool (in this case, a java project) which supports converting RAML 0.8 API definition to Swagger 2.0 API definition.

name: raml-json-api
author: Arthur
description: RAML-JSON-API PHP-code generator (based on RAML-types) for Laravel framework, with complete support of JSON-API data format.

name: API Designer
author: MuleSoft
description: API Designer is a web-based API development tool that allows API providers to design their API quickly, efficiently, and consistently, and socialize the design. It consists of a RAML editor side-by-side with an embedded RAML console (the API Console).

name: API Console
author: MuleSoft
description: API Console is a graphical user interface for a RAML-defined API that visually exposes the API's structure and important patterns and serves as interactive API documentation.

name: RAML for JAX-RS
author: MuleSoft
description: The goal of RAML for JAX-RS is to provide a set of tools to work with these technologies in a way of being able to scaffold a JAVA + JAX-RS application based on an existing RAML API definition (Code Generation), or its roundtrip, generate the RAML API def

name: RAML2HTML for PHP
author: Mike Stowe
description: RAML 2 HTML for PHP is a simple application that makes use of multiple templates to allow you to build and customize your API Docs using RAML.

name: Osprey
author: MuleSoft
description: Osprey is a JavaScript framework for rapidly building applications that expose RAML APIs. It's based on Node and Express.

name: Restlet Studio
author: Restlet
description: Restlet Studio is a lightweight web-based development environment that accelerates the design of APIs.

name: API Notebook
author: MuleSoft
description: API Notebook is a web-based, persistent, JavaScript scripting workspace that enables live testing and exploring of APIs, and saving API use cases as markdown gists, so they are versioned, forkable and shareable. It's an example of literate programming.

name: Abao
author: cybertk
description: Abao is a command-line tool for testing API documentation written in RAML format against its backend implementation.

name: ramlfications
author: Spotify
description: RAML reference implementation in Python

name: RAML Tools for .NET
author: MuleSoft
description: RAML Tools for .NET allows developers to easily integrate and consume APIs that expose a RAML definition, or create a new ASP.NET Web API implementation using a contract-first approach from a previously created RAML definition.

name: raml-server
author: Franco Arolfo
description: RAML Server exposes a full fake REST API with zero coding by writing a RAML spec.

name: Vigia
author: nogates
description: Vigia is a adaptable API integration test suite which supports test generation based on a RAML definition file.

name: swagger2raml
author: rucek
description: Swagger2RAML is an utility to generate RAML from Swagger JSON.

name: RAML Java Parser
author: MuleSoft
description: A reference implementation of a RAML parser for Java. The parser is based on SnakeYAML, and written in Java. It can be added as a Java library either into a project directly or through Apache Maven. Compliant with RAML 0.8 and 1.0.

name: Sandbox
author: Sandbox
description: Quick and easy mock RESTful API and SOAP webservices. Generate from API definitions, instant deploy, collaborative build, and debugging tools for integration.

name: Postman
author: Postman
description: Postman is a chrome app that lets you import RAML to easily call and test APIs.

name: APIkit 1.0
author: MuleSoft
description: APIkit is a declarative toolkit that leverages RAML to facilitate the implementation of APIs.

name: RAML2Wiki
author: jhitchcock
description: A simple RAML to Wiki (Confluence / JIRA Markup) documentation generator, written for Node.js.

name: RAMSES
author: Brandicted
description: RAML + Elasticsearch + Pyramid = REST API. Ramses is a library that generates a RESTful API using RAML. It uses Pyramid and Nefertari which provides ElasticSearch-powered views.

name: RAML JavaScript Parser
author: MuleSoft
description: Official JavaScript parser for RAML. Supports versions 0.8 and 1.0

name: ramlapi
author: The Economist Group
description: This package is designed to work with RAML files and build the appropriate handlers and routing rules in Go projects.

name: SDK/DOC generator
author: IsaaCloud
description: Generate docs or SDKs in Java, JavaScript, and PHP

name: Spring MVC - RAML Spec Synchroniser Plugin
author: phoenixNAP
description: Spring MVC - RAML Spec Synchroniser Plugin. A Maven plugin designed to Generate Server & Client code in Spring from a RAML API descriptor and conversely, a RAML API document from the SpringMVC Server implementation.

name: RAMLSharp
author: Quicken Loans
description: This is a tool for ASP.net Web API that will allow you to build RAML documentation.

name: RAML to Bootstrap
author: Probe Dock
description: Generate a Bootstrap page for your API documentation in RAML

name: RAML Ruby
author: kgorin @ coub
description: A reference implementation of a RAML parser in Ruby. It uses Psych YAML parser and is written in Ruby. Compliant with RAML 0.8.

name: Api2Symfony Bundle
author: Creads
description: A Symfony2 bundle to automatically generate controllers from RAML API specifications

name: Gradle RAML Plugin
author: A.J. Brown
description: Validate your RAML documentation, and turn it into HTML. Based on raml2html.

name: raml-tester
author: Stefan Niederhauser
description: Test if a request/response matches a given raml definition.

name: RAML Client Generator
author: MuleSoft
description: Template-driven generator of clients for APIs described by RAML.

name: jooby-raml
author: Jooby
description: Export Jooby routes to RAML 1.0 and give you live doc and testing wit no extra effort.

name: go-raml
author: Alon Diamant
description: An implementation of a RAML parser for Go. Compliant with RAML 0.8.

name: API Spec Converter
author: StopLight.io
description: This package helps to convert between different API specifications (Postman, Swagger, RAML, StopLight).

name: OAS RAML Converter
author: MuleSoft
description: This package helps to convert between different API specifications. It was originally forked from the stoplight.io converter but has been greatly improved. It supports OAS 2.0 <> RAML 1.0, 0.8

name: RAML Store
author: brianmc
description: This project provides an persistent store for RAML files created using then embedded API Designer.

name: API designer using local filesystem
author: sichvoge
description: An implementation of MuleSoft's API designer using the local filesystem.

name: raml2html PHP
author: LeanLabs
description: raml2html documentation generator based on PHP

name: Jumpscale go-raml
author: Jumpscale
description: Server and client generation for RAML 1.0

name: gulp-RAML2HTML
author: walling
description: A simple gulp plugin to automate the process of generating HTML documentation based on a RAML API.

name: RAMLRenderer
author: beno
description: HTML documentation builder for RAML 1.0 written in Crystal

name: PHP RAML Parser
author: alecsammon
description: A reference implementation of a RAML parser in PHP. Compliant with RAML 0.8.

name: RAML2Java
author: Juan Desimoni
description: Web app that generate a consumable Java interface based on Retrofit annotations from a RAML spec file. Requires SBT & Scala 2.11+

name: ramlo
author: PGS Software
description: Command line tool based on Node.js for generating RESTful API documentations written in RAML.

name: LocalAPI
author: IsaaCloud
description: LocalAPI is application based on Node.js library and allows for running a fully functional API on the basis of definitions included in a raml file. The application also generates dummy data json files from templates and serve them as a response body in AP

name: RAML Builder
author: Eric Neuhauser
description: This tool builds separate RAML, YAML, Schema, and JSON files into a single RAML and generates it to HTML.

name: RAML Sublime Plugin
author: MuleSoft
description: RAML Sublime Plugin is a syntax highlighter for Sublime (the popular text editor).

name: API Designer for Git FS
author: Stephane
description: api-designer console fork for pulling github hosted raml/json-schema files.

name: raml-mocker
author: David Vega Fontelos
description: Node module to create random responses to requests based on RAML REST definition.

name: ramltomd
author: Diego Gurgel
description: A RAML to markdown converter made in modejs.

name: pyraml-parser
author: an2deg
description: A reference implementation of a RAML parser for Python. It's based on PyYAML and written in Python. Compliant with RAML 0.8.

name: RAML PHP Client Generator
author: jayS-de
description: Generate a PHP API client from RAML.

name: sphinx-raml
author: Pierre Tardy
description: A sphinx extension to include raml based documentation into a sphinx doc

name: SCRAML
author: Atomic BITS
description: Scraml generates a typesafe Java or Scala client library based on a RAML specification. It transforms JSON schema into fully typed Java POJOs or Scala case classes and a REST resources DSL that enforces your RAML specification.

name: PSX Framework
author: Christoph Kappestein
description: PSX is a framework written in PHP to create REST APIs. It provides tools to handle routing, API versioning, data transformation, authentication, documentation and testing.

name: RAML Maven Plugin
author: Hubrick
description: Provides generation of Spring Web resource interfaces based on RAML files.

name: RAML Parser for .NET
author: MuleSoft
description: A RAML Parser implementation in .NET for all CLR languages. The parser is implemented as a strongly-typed wrapper around the JavaScript parser, leveraging Edge.js as a Node.js host.

name: SoapUI RAML Plugin
author: SmartBear
description: SoapUI is a very popular functional testing tool, broadly used for testing any HTTP APIs including both SOAP and REST, as well as JMS, AMF, and JDBC. The RAML plugin for SoapUI allows the importing of RAML APIs into SoapUI for testing.

name: ATOM RAML package
author: n4ch03
description: ATOM RAML Package is a plugin (package) for ATOM (Github's text editor) that helps the user to write RAML specs by providing highlighting capabilities and snippets autocompletion.

name: Ruby RamlParser
author: ePages
description: A Ruby based parser for the RAML API modeling language.

name: Ra
author: Ramses
description: Ra is a test suite generator and helper library for testing APIs described in RAML. Out of the box, Ra provides a basic, automated test suite to test the routes declared in the RAML document. It provides test helpers for augmenting these with custom test

name: Nobel
author: nohorbee
description: Nobel (code-generator) creates a REST API for your Arduino board, based on a RAML definition.

name: RAML Syntax Highlighting for Visual Studio Code
author: Jeppe Lund Andersen
description: This is a RAML syntax highlighting implementation for VS Code based on the official Sublime Text version language file.

name: raml-1-mocker
author: Artem Soltynskiy
description: Node module to create mock service based on RAML 1.0 specification.

name: RAML Mock-ups
author: Alvaro Cabrera
description: Express-based mocking service for RAML development.

name: RamlParser
author: Nat Chapman
description: An Elixir parser for RAML API spec files

name: RAML JavaScript Generator
author: MuleSoft
description: Generate a JavaScript API client from RAML.

name: ramlnova
author: ANAS IT Inc.
description: ramlnova is the next-generation RESTful-APIs Generator software (Laravel 5.2, golang, etc) that makes you Reduce the 70% server coding workload. It's scalable, intelligent, and fast.

name: raml-scaffold
author: Benjamin Ihrig
description: Scaffolding for RAML

name: Raml Ruby Client Generator
author: Newell Zhu
description: Auto Generate Ruby Client from Raml.

name: Rambo
author: Dana Scheider
description: Rambo is a gem that generates API contract tests from API docs in RAML.

name: Brújula
author: nogates
description: Yet another Ruby RAML parser aiming for version 1.0 fully support

name: RAML Linter
author: Quicken Loans
description: RAML Linter is a static analysis, linter-like, utility that will enforce rules on a given RAML document, ensuring consistency and quality.

name: express-raml-store
author: colthreepv
description: This project makes the api-designer work with a persistence layer to a specified directory, so the users can code into the designer and output into filesystem (and version control!).

name: SBT RAML Plugin
author: Eigengo
description: The purpose of this plugin is to provide syntax checking and documentation generator for your RAML API definitions.

name: RAML Mock Server
author: OzWolf
description: Java + JUnit library for running a Mock Server then verifying interactions match the API specifications defined in the RAML specification

name: go-raml-parser
author: tsaikd
description: RAML (1.0) parser implementation in golang

name: Amazon API Gateway Importer
author: AWS Labs
description: The Amazon API Gateway Importer lets you create or update Amazon API Gateway APIs from a RAML API representation.

name: RAML 1.0 Parser for .NET
author: MuleSoft
description: A RAML Parser implementation in .NET for all CLR languages. The parser is implemented as a strongly-typed wrapper around the JavaScript parser, leveraging Edge.js as a Node.js host.

name: raml-jaxrs
author: CJS Common Platform
description: RAML to JAXRS generator

name: raml-csharp-parser
author: Martin Pueyo
description: This project contains a RAML csharp parser compatible with version 0.8 of the RAML specification.

name: PHP RAML Server (fork)
author: jasir
description: This is an implementation of a Apache/PHP server which takes a RAML API specification and stubs a working API server leveraging the Slim Microframework.

name: RAML Perl Parser
author: Sean P Quinlan
description: Perl parser for RAML API definitions

name: play-raml
author: Vadim
description: play-raml is a sbt plugin for play framework 2.4, which replaces the default routes definition syntax used in conf/routes with RAML. This plugin inspired by sbt-play-raml.

name: RAML Cop
author: thebinarypenguin
description: A command line tool for validating RAML files. It uses raml-org/raml-js-parser for parsing, and can optionally output the parsed RAML as JSON.

name: hapi-raml
author: Dave Irvine
description: This library will take your RAML, parse it using raml-parser, and then set up routes in hapi to match your RAML.

name: RAML Client Generator for Gulp
author: Brent Montague
description: This allows for a raml file to be turned into a client library via the javascript-raml-generator node module with gulp even easier!

name: vim-raml
author: Kenneth Feng
description: RAML plugin for VIM

name: RAML Validate
author: MuleSoft
description: Strict and pluginable validation of RAML parameters.

name: eslint-plugin-raml
author: Nikita Galkin
description: Eslint rules for RAML. You can use it for testing your RAML in Continuous Integration.

name: php-ramlMerge
author: Mike Stowe
description: RAML Merge lets you merge in any included RAML files (!include) into a single RAML file via the command line.

name: raml-fleece
author: Janrain
description: raml-fleece turns RAML into a readable HTML file. It currently supports version 0.8 as defined in the 0.8 RAML specification.

name: raml2pdf-cli
author: Christian Heindl
description: Command-line RAML to PDF converter.

name: Diet RAML generator
author: Oscar Reyes
description: A resource code generator for diet with raml

name: generator-ramlang
author: Syple Technologies
description: RAMLang is a simple and easy to use command line tool. It's main goal is to provide AngularJS services which help communicate with RESTful API's. How it works is it takes a RAML spec document and generates the RESTful resources in a contained module.

name: GULP RAML plugin
author: JohanObrink
description: GULP RAML Plugin is a GULP based add-on that allows to parse and validate a RAML definition as a GULP Task. It's based on the JavaScript RAML Parser.

name: DropWizard RAML View
author: OzWolf
description: Allow the adding of an API resource to a DropWizard service that displays the RAML specification for that service in a human-readable format.

name: RAML Data Type System
author: MuleSoft
description: This module contains a lightweight implementation of the type system that was introduced with RAML 1.0. It allows you to to parse, validate , modify RAML types, as well as store them back to JSON.

name: metalsmith-raml
author: Lotaris SA
description: This is a plugin for Metalsmith that parses RAML API Specifications and renders them using any templating engine.

name: vim-raml
author: Eric Hopkins
description: Vim syntax and language settings for RAML

name: linter-raml
author: Cyprien Quilici
description: Lint RAML documentation on the fly in atom using raml-js-parser

name: ramlev
author: cybertk
description: ramlev is a simple RAML Example Validator, which is used to validate the examples defined in RAML against its schema.

name: Autocode RAML Processor
author: Autocode
description: Process models and export them as RAML with Autocode

name: RAML Lorem-Impsum
author: Ioannis Charalampidis
description: A simple library and CLI utility for generating random data from RAML 1.0 type specifications.

name: raml2mocha
author: Miles Oldenburg
description: Automated mocha.js test generation for RAML API specs.

name: RAML JSON Schema Expander
author: Adam Newman
description: This library will expand JSON Schema draft 4 schema references in a raml object created by raml2obj. It was primarily created for use in raml2html so that schemas which reference other schemas will be expanded instead of leaving "$ref": "foo.json#".

name: raml2travis
author: Innova Co S.à r.l
description: Travis CI plugin for RAML

name: PAW RAML Specification Importer 0.8
author: A.J. Brown
description: A Paw Extension to import RAML 0.8 Specification into Paw.

name: PAW RAML Specification Importer 1.0
author: A.J. Brown
description: A Paw Extension to import RAML 1.0 Specification into Paw.

name: raml2test
author: aisensiy
description: A tool to translate raml to mocha api test

name: raml-olingo-codegen
author: Subhobrata Dey
description: The raml-olingo-codegen project provides a tool to generate a scaffolding for an Apache Olingo application from a given set of Raml files.

name: grunt-raml
author: MuleSoft
description: A Grunt Plugin for validating RAML files

name: RAML CLI Validator
author: A.J. Brown
description: The command line utility can be used for validating the syntax of a RAML file.

name: Test Compatibility Kit for RAML Parsers
author: MuleSoft
description: A collection of RAML specifications for use to test a RAML Parsers capability, or for use when developing your own parser.

name: Vrap
author: vrap.io
description: Validating Rest API proxy

name: uml2raml
author: Davide Rossi
description: UML to RAML generator for MDE toolchains. Available as command-line utility and Maven plugin.

name: RAML API Tester
author: Michael Fischer
description: The RAML API Tester (RAT) is a simple javascript library and cli that can be used to test an enpoint serving the api implemenation of a RAML spec.

name: cookiecutter-raml
author: genzj
description: Cookiecutter template for creating a RAML 1.0 project.

name: restdocs-raml
author: ePages
description: An extension to Spring REST Docs that adds RAML as an output format.

name: angular-http-raml
author: Bence Eros
description: Library for building HTTP stubs and mocks for Angular apps, based on RAML definitions
